sentences.en: According to bioreactor landfill, it is the key work to control the moisture distribution in landfills.
sentences.cn: 对于生物反应器填埋场, 控制填埋场内部的水分分布是研究的关键之一.

sentences.en: At present, the main method of sludge disposal is landfill, composting and incineration of three farm.
sentences.cn: 目前, 污泥的处置方法主要是填埋 、 堆肥农用和焚烧三种.

sentences.en: But it also means you'll diverting Stuff from the landfill.
sentences.cn: 但是这同样意味着你将享受将这些东西免于丢掉的乐趣.

sentences.en: Clay liners remain an important of component of composite liners used in landfill construction.
sentences.cn: 粘土衬垫仍然是一件重要的部件组合衬垫填埋工程中使用.

sentences.en: Co - operation project: The supply and the construction about the leakproof material of landfill.
sentences.cn: 合作经营项目: 供应和建设有关密封材料的堆填区.

sentences.en: Environmentalists say there is a high risk of pollution from the landfill site.
sentences.cn: 环境保护工作者说废渣埋填地很可能造成污染.

sentences.en: Extraction method of landfill gas was introduced based on practice experience.
sentences.cn: 并根据实践经验介绍了抽取填埋气体的方法.

sentences.en: However, as landfill capacity decreased, volume reduction became more important.
sentences.cn: 然而, 由于填埋容量减少, 体积减少变得更加重要.

sentences.en: I am in a plastic bag in a landfill now.
sentences.cn: 我现在被装在黑色塑胶袋里,静静的躺在掩埋场.

sentences.en: It has been found that LFG a potentially danger for the buildings near the landfill site.
sentences.cn: 测试结果表明,填埋气体的横向迁移现象明显,对周围建筑物安全具有潜在的威胁.

sentences.en: Keywords: strategy, sustainability, reuse, landfill, incineration, agricultural application, melting.
sentences.cn: 关键词: 处置策略 、 永续性 、 再利用 、 卫生掩埋 、 焚化 、 农地利用 、 熔融.

sentences.en: Settlement of Municipal Solid Waste ( MSW ) might influence directly the safety of sanitary landfill.
sentences.cn: 城市生活固体废弃物 ( MSW ) 的沉降直接影响着卫生填埋场的安全.

sentences.en: Site selection is the key in the construction and operation of sanitary landfill.
sentences.cn: 选址是卫生填埋场建设和运行的关键.

sentences.en: The influence of water content of the media on landfill gas migration is taken into account.
sentences.cn: 模型中考虑了填埋场中介质含水量变化对气体运移的影响.

sentences.en: The vitrified soil, as hard as granite, can be used for landfill.
sentences.cn: 玻璃化的土壤类似坚硬的花岗岩, 可以用于填埋.

trans.tran_en: Landfill is a method of getting rid of very large amounts of rubbish by burying it in a large deep hole
